newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Islamic militant Hamas claims Israel bombing.
newsitem.headline: Islamic militant Hamas claims Israel bombing.

text.p: The Islamic militant movement Hamas claimed responsibility for a double suicide bombing that killed 14 people on Wednesday in Jerusalem.

The group issued the claim in a leaflet faxed to an international news agency which gave Israel until 9 p.m. (1800 GMT) on Sunday to free all Palestinian prisoners including Hamas founder Sheikh Ahmed Yassin.

Hamas sources said the group's Izz el-Din al-Qassam military brigades carried out the attack in Jerusalem's main Jewish market to avenge a Jewish woman's pasting of posters on Hebron storefronts depicting the Moslem Prophet Mohammad as a pig.

They said it also was in retaliation for the publication in an Israeli science magazine of a photomontage of the Virgin Mary with a cow's head. The photo, to illustrate a story on cloning, angered Palestinian Christians.
"The Izz el-Din al-Qassam Brigades martyrs unit (claims)...responsibility for the jihad operation in Jerusalem," the leaflet said.

It demanded the immediate release of Sheikh Yassin and all other Palestinian prisoners, including those from Hamas. "The time to carry out our just demands starts from the date of this leaflet and ends at 9 o'clock on Sunday evening, August 3," it said without elaborating.
